blocks.name: divcnv
blocks.content: The sequence of reciprocals of positive integers, multiplied by the factor ` A ` , converges to zero. (Contributed by NM, 6-Feb-2008.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 18-Sep-2014.)

thm divcnv(setvar s0, class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cc), wbr(cmpt(s0, cn, co(c0, cdiv, cv(s0))), cli, nat0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  mpbid(wcel(c0, cc), wbr(cmpt(s0, cn, co(c0, cdiv, cv(s0))), cli, nat0), wbr(cmpt(s0, cn, co(c0, cdiv, cv(s0))), crli, nat0))
  rlimres2(s0, cn, co(c0, cdiv, cv(s0)), nat0, crp, wcel(c0, cc))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cc), wss(cn, crp))
  ssriv(s0, cn, crp)
  nnrp(cv(s0))
  divrcnv(s0, c0)
  rlimclim(cmpt(s0, cn, co(c0, cdiv, cv(s0))), nat0, cn, nat1, wcel(c0, cc))
  nnuz()
  1zzd(wcel(c0, cc))
  fmpttd(s0, cn, co(c0, cdiv, cv(s0)), cc, wcel(c0, cc))
  divcld(c0, cv(s0), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(cv(s0), cn)))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(cv(s0), cn))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(cv(s0), cn), wcel(cv(s0), cc))

  diff.cn.s(s0)
  diff.crp.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cc)
  diff.cc.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: supcvg
blocks.content: Extract a sequence ` f ` in ` X ` such that the image of the points in the bounded set ` A ` converges to the supremum ` S ` of the set. Similar to Equation 4 of [Kreyszig] p. 144. The proof uses countable choice ~ ax-cc . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Feb-2013.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 26-Apr-2014.)

blocks.name: harmonic
blocks.content: The harmonic series ` H ` diverges. This fact follows from the stronger ~ emcl , which establishes that the harmonic series grows as ` log n + gamma + ` _o_(1), but this uses a more elementary method, attributed to Nicole Oresme (1323-1382). This is Metamath 100 proof #34. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Jul-2014.)
